name: Which Is The Best Airline Lounge in Atlanta?
description:
Atlanta's airport is the busiest in the world! More than 100 million people land and takeoff from its five runways every year. This means it must have some of the best airline lounges. Right?

Well, you can decide for yourself which is the best airline lounge in Atlanta by watching this video.

The other day, I landed in Atlanta after a flight from Tucson, Arizona. When I looked at my connecting flight, I realized I had a four-hour layover! I decided I could either sit and read OR do something epic! So, I chose something epic: Visiting every club in the Atlanta airport in one day. This meant A LOT of walking (more than five miles) and a lot of stairs (31 flights)!

The good news? You can enjoy everything I saw without the effort. Enjoy!

And, stick around to the end to find out how long it takes to get from one end of the airport to the other in the Atlanta airport train and even how long it takes to walk across the entire Atlanta airport! 

Along the way, we'll stop off at the Delta Sky Clubs in Concourses T, A, B, C, D, E, F, the Admiral's Club in Concourse T, and the Club at ATL in Concourse F. 

Here are the details for each club:
Delta Sky Club
Concourse T (near Gate T6)
Mon – Sun:  5:00am – 10:00pm
Conference Room

American Airlines Admirals Club
Concourse T (Across From Gate T11)
Mon - Fri: 4:30 am - 8 pm
Sat: 4:30 am - 7:30 pm
Sun: 5:30 am - 8 pm
Conference Room

United Airlines Club*
Concourse T (Between Gates T11 and T12)
Sun – Fri: 4:45 am – 8:45 pm 
Sat: 4:45 am – 7:00 pm

Delta Sky Club
Concourse A (in the center on 2nd level)
Mon – Sun:  6:00am – 10:00pm
Conference Room

Delta Sky Club
Concourse A (near Gate A17)
Mon – Sun:  5:00am – 11:00pm

Delta Sky Club
Concourse B (near Gate B18)
Mon – Sun:  6:00am – 11:00pm

Delta Sky Club
Concourse C (near Gate C37)
Mon – Sun:  6:00am – 11:00pm

Delta Sky Club
Concourse D (near Gate D12)
Mon – Sun:  6:00am – 10:00pm

Delta Sky Club
Concourse D (near Gate D27)
Mon – Sun:  6:00am – 11:00pm

Delta Sky Club
Concourse E (across from Gate E15)
Mon – Sun:  6:00am – 10:00pm
Showers

Delta Sky Club
Concourse F (Mezzanine Level)
Mon – Sun:  5:30am – 11:00pm
Showers
Sun Deck

The Club at ATL
Concourse F (Mezzanine Level)
Mon – Sun:  6:00am – 10:30 pm

* I missed the United Airlines Club during my visit. So, I guess I'll have to do this all over again!
